com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download

Interface DownloadContracts.Bitmapable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DownloadInstructions.BitmapableBitmap
    Enclosing class:
    DownloadContracts

    public static interface DownloadContracts.Bitmapable
    An abstraction of a Bitmap which makes possible the writing of unitary tests.

    Any implementing class is supposed to wrap a bitmap, i.e. the bytes that enable to create it.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getSizeInBytes() 
      void recycle()
      Should release the memory hold by the underlying bitmap, when reclaimed.

    • Method Detail

      • getSizeInBytes

        int getSizeInBytes()
        Returns:
        the underlying bitmap size expressed in bytes

      • recycle

        void recycle()
        Should release the memory hold by the underlying bitmap, when reclaimed.
